# Carmenta

> A heart-centered AI interface with complete memory, multi-model access, AI team, and
> purpose-built responses for builders who work at the speed of thought.

Carmenta embodies Heart Centered AI - human and artificial intelligence as expressions
of the same underlying consciousness. Uses "we" language throughout, dissolving the
human-machine boundary. Built using AI-First Development where knowledge/ IS the product
specification.

## For AI Assistants

- [AGENTS.md](AGENTS.md): Required conventions, anti-patterns to avoid, error handling
- [.claude/CLAUDE.md](.claude/CLAUDE.md): Agent/skill standards, model tiers, YAML patterns

## Getting Started

- [README](README.md): Project overview, setup instructions, tech stack
- [Getting Started](docs/getting-started.md): New user onboarding guide
- [What is Carmenta](docs/what-is-carmenta.md): Core identity and value proposition

## Product Knowledge

- [Vision](knowledge/vision.md): Why Carmenta exists, for whom, what success looks like
- [AI-First Development](knowledge/ai-first-development.md): How products get built with AI
- [Components Catalog](knowledge/components/README.md): Full feature specifications
- [Tech Architecture](knowledge/tech-architecture.md): Technical stack and decisions
- [Roadmap](knowledge/roadmap.md): Milestones organized by audience (M0-M4)

## Key Components

- [Concierge](knowledge/components/concierge.md): Pre/post processing, model selection
- [Memory](knowledge/components/memory.md): Context and memory management
- [AI Team](knowledge/components/ai-team.md): Digital Chief of Staff and agents
- [Scheduled Agents](knowledge/components/scheduled-agents.md): Automated agent execution
- [Knowledge Base](knowledge/components/knowledge-base.md): Personal knowledge layer
- [Service Connectivity](knowledge/components/service-connectivity.md): Integration architecture

## Development Standards

- [TypeScript Standards](.cursor/rules/frontend/typescript-coding-standards.mdc): Coding conventions
- [Git Workflow](.cursor/rules/git-interaction.mdc): Commit practices, version control
- [Error Handling](knowledge/components/error-handling.md): Let errors throw philosophy
- [Prompt Engineering](.cursor/rules/prompt-engineering.mdc): Writing prompts for LLMs

## AI Capabilities

- [Commands](.claude/commands/): 18 user-invoked workflows (build-next, do-issue, etc.)
- [Agents](.claude/agents/): 7 specialized agents (empathy-reviewer, browser-verifier)
- [Skills](.claude/skills/): 5 auto-triggered capabilities (writing-for-llms, testing)

- [Competitors](knowledge/competitors/README.md): Competitive landscape analysis
